Html:
Receing following message when query completed with errors. I installed SQL Server 2005 Express with advanced pack for full-text service and still getting this. Anybody know what I can do to fix some of these....Would greatly appreciate any help, working on term project for school

 

Msg 911, Level 16, State 1, Line 1
Could not locate entry in sysdatabases for database 'KiGG'. No entry found with that name. Make sure that the name is entered correctly.
Msg 9966, Level 16, State 1, Procedure sp_fulltext_database, Line 33
Cannot use full-text search in master, tempdb, or model database.
Msg 7609, Level 17, State 100, Line 2
Full-Text Search is not installed, or a full-text component cannot be loaded.
Msg 7609, Level 17, State 103, Line 4
Full-Text Search is not installed, or a full-text component cannot be loaded.
Msg 7609, Level 17, State 103, Line 3
Full-Text Search is not installed, or a full-text component cannot be loaded.
Msg 7601, Level 16, State 2, Procedure StorySearch, Line 0
Cannot use a CONTAINS or FREETEXT predicate on table or indexed view 'Story' because it is not full-text indexed.
Msg 7601, Level 16, State 2, Procedure CommentSearch, Line 0
Cannot use a CONTAINS or FREETEXT predicate on table or indexed view 'StoryComment' because it is not full-text indexed.
Msg 7601, Level 16, State 2, Procedure EFSearchComment, Line 0
Cannot use a CONTAINS or FREETEXT predicate on table or indexed view 'StoryComment' because it is not full-text indexed.
Msg 7601, Level 16, State 2, Procedure EFSearchStory, Line 0
Cannot use a CONTAINS or FREETEXT predicate on table or indexed view 'Story' because it is not full-text indexed.
Did you fix this problem. I have the same problem?
